fixes.name: Risk Date # of Days
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the tableau calculated field [RISK_DATE]-[EFFECTIVE_DATE] to a DAX calculated column using row-level date subtraction. Uses the same table-qualified column references.

fixes.name: Bull Steepener Large Shock
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR Days = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Risk Date # of Days]
RETURN
IF(
    Days < 750,
    -10,
    IF(
        Days > 10950,
        -5,
        -10 * (1 - (Days - 750) / (10950 - 750)) + -5 * (Days - 750) / (10950 - 750)
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the nested IF logic from Tableau into DAX. Comments were removed. The calculation references the dependent calculated column 'Risk Date # of Days' (created above) and performs row-level comparisons and arithmetic, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
